title: NTP Ep. 4 - If you struggle with what people think about you... with Lauren Chandler
description:
How do you handle other people's opinions of you? My friend Lauren Chandler will help you prayerfully respond to expectations and hurtful words. She is peaceful and I love the way she loves Jesus. You have to listen to this!

Lauren's new Bible study on the book of Numbers here: https://www.amazon.com/Us-Wilderness-Bible-Study-Numbers/dp/1087700787

We love the Dwell audio Bible app: dwellapp.io/madeforthis
